2022 Indy 500 Travel Packages

Roadtrips’ 2022 Indy 500 travel packages include your preferred tickets to the 2022 Indy 500, three nights’ first-class downtown accommodation, VIP reserved festival parade seating or Legends Day admission, Indy 500 Race Museum tickets and much more. We invite you to take advantage of our expertise and high-touch service so you can experience the ultimate Indy 500 weekend. Our custom-crafted 2022 Indy 500 travel packages are available from $1,875 per person (based on double occupancy).

About the 2022 Indy 500

The Indy 500 is IndyCar’s premier event and is held at the iconic Indianapolis Motor Speedway. The 2022 Indy 500 will be the 106th running of this great event. The race plays out over 500 miles (200 laps) and is traditionally held over Memorial Day Weekend. The next Indy 500 is scheduled for May 29, 2022.

The beloved Indy 500 showcases the top level of American Championship IndyCar racing. It is billed as the “greatest spectacle in racing” and is the largest single day sporting event in the world, with an impressive track capacity for over 400,000 spectators. This historic event is considered part of the Triple Crown of Motorsport, one of the three most prestigious motorsport events in the world (the 24 Hours or Le Mans and the Monaco Grand Prix are the other two). The inaugural race was held in 1911 and was won by Ray Harroun.
